Atlanta.Empire Manufacturing Company Building:
The Empire Manufacturing Company Building located in the Old Fourth Ward neighborhood of Atlanta, Georgia.
The building was built in 1939 by the North Carolina firm of Jackson & Edney for the National Linen Service Corporation which in 1962 merged with Zep to become National Service Industries, Inc. In the late 1990s, renovation of the building was started to convert the building into loft office space as a part of the Southern Dairies Redevlopment.
